childMarkdownRemark.html: The Open Source Hardware Association (OSHWA) aims to foster technological knowledge and encourage research that is accessible, collaborative and respects user freedom.

body.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"OSHWA produces helpful resources for the open source hardware community to learn about open source hardware and how to participate in the community. Below are a number of resources that might be useful to you as you get started. Check out the Resources page for more!","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

relatedResources.resourceTitle: Best Practices for Open Source Hardware 1.0
Best Practices for Sharing FPGA Designs
A Resolution to Redefine SPI Signal Names
